Parents please vaccinate your children. It is safe & so worth it for your child & others as well!https://twitter.com/realDonaldTrump/status/449525268529815552 …

1113218477567959041.text: I truly hate the Anti-vaxxer movement Having two BBFs friends who were polio survivors and seeing how hard ordinary things were especially for one who was wheelchair bound. It makes me furious.

1113207891689914369.text: Amen sister. Looking for reasons, including this dangerous irrational one, for autism is a waste of time. It's better spent helping the child, utilizing appropriate therapies, lovingly supporting and teaching them.

1113219192478679041.text: So incredibly irresponsible.  What idiots.   Putting all children at risk.

1113374558080393216.text: I know, my grandfather and stepmother both had polio. My stepmother had it in utero. My grandpa developed post polio syndrome when he got old. Stepmom ended up with MS as well and she died of an infection that lingered in her knee where her kneecaps should have been at 59.

1113220291143131138.text: People have forgotten that pregnant women exposed to measles can have babies born with serious birth defects including blindness & deafness Noah has to be careful too because of his compromised immune system now. Assholes

1113220524874895361.text: Yes.  So many ramifications. How is Noah?

1113208788033474560.text: I saw your tweet this morning. Thinking of you and yours  you would actually know...

1113221986036133893.text: Today is infusion day. He has gained 6 lbs but he was down to 114 He needs to gain 20 more. His spirits are much better since they moved back home. They will be back Friday I hope

1113209288795787264.text: Thanks, Meems! He's my heart. My precious one.

1113232780870209542.text: That's good to hear that he's improved somewhat. Bless you all, I don't know how you do it.
